QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride in Mulgore
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Kar Stormsinger.$B$BKar can be found in Mulgore's Bloodhoof Village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the pamphlet to Kar Stormsinger at Bloodhoof Village in Mulgore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
